rules_text:
When Mesmerized Bookworm enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may cast a creature card with mana value 2 or less from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Conceptualize {2}{W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its conceptualize cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)[/i]
